abilities.title: Luminous Pulse
abilities.description: Emits a blinding flash of light to disorient predators and prey.

abilities.title: Shadow Meld
abilities.description: Can blend seamlessly into shadows, becoming nearly invisible in low light.

abilities.title: Telepathic Echo
abilities.description: Communicates thoughts and emotions over long distances without sound.

habitats.environment: Dense, enchanted forest with towering silver-leaved trees
Serene freshwater lake surrounded by crystalline formations

encounters.outcome: Lumivora illuminated the night sky, averting a feared eclipse prophecy.
Documented Lumivora's telepathic abilities, leading to new studies in mythical communication.

relatedLegends.title: Echoes in the Shadow
relatedLegends.source: Chronicles of the Silverpine, Oral Tradition
